items.title: Integrations
items.description: Accelerate your work with these additional tools.

children.title: Version your Git code with Gitea
children.description: Use Gitea for persistence and version control of your projects.

children.title: Create workflows with Airflow
children.description: Configure and schedule project pipelines with this orchestration tool.

children.title: Manage Python packages with devpi
children.description: Use devpi to manage your private Python packages from PyPI.
